      • getCurrentDateFromNetwork

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentDateFromNetwork(java.lang.String dateFormat,
                                                         java.lang.String monthFormat,
                                                         java.lang.String yearFormat,
                                                         java.lang.String divider,
                                                         java.lang.String dateMonthYearOrder)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns Current Date from global internet server in custom format and order.
        Parameters:
        dateFormat - the date format. Ex: "dd"
        monthFormat - the month format. Ex: "MM" or "MMM" or "MMMM"
        yearFormat - the year format. Ex: "yyyy"
        divider - the divider. Ex: " " or "-" or "/"
        dateMonthYearOrder - the date month year order. Ex: "dmy" or "ymd" or "myd", Also by default the order is "ymd"
        Returns:
        the string
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • subtractDateFromDateReturnDays

        public static long subtractDateFromDateReturnDays(java.lang.String date1,
                                                  java.lang.String date2,
                                                  java.lang.String dateMonthYearOrder)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Subtract date from date. "date2 - date1". Returns the difference in days.
        Parameters:
        date1 - the date1 in format "yyyy MM dd". Ex: 2015 10 14
        date2 - the date2 in format "yyyy MM dd". Ex: 2015 10 20
        dateMonthYearOrder - the date month year order for input/result date. Ex: "ymd" or "mdy" or "dmy", Also by default the order is "ymd"
        Returns:
        the difference in days
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
